Burma: The Pyu of Sri Ksetra Kingdom launch the Burmese calendar with the start date of 22 March 638.
China: The Protectorate General to Pacify the West was established. Tang campaign against Karakhoja: Tang defeated and annexed Gaochang.
Germany:
Pepin of Landen died.
Otto (mayor of the palace) was appointed mayor of the palace of Austrasia.
Italy: Muslim conquest of Egypt: A Rashidun force laid siege to Pelusium. The legions of the East Roman army were reorganized into themes.
